Write a for loop to print the even numbers from 1 to 100.

```{r}
x <- 1:100
for(i in x) {
  if((i %% 2 == 0) == TRUE) {
    print(i)
  }
}
```

```{r}
evens <- c()
for(i in x) {
  if((i %% 2 == 0) == TRUE) {
    evens <- c(evens, i)
  }
}

print(evens)
```
